name: Weapons
content:
Bare Hands

Name Rank Attack Magic Accuracy Initiative Range Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.weapons.h4I5KQBrZ8Ksy27L]{Unarmed} 0 Refer Refer 0 0 Close 0

Attack Power is equal to your [STR Mod]. Magic Power is equal to your [INT Mod]. This is considered a [Melee Attack] capable weapon.

Name Rank Attack Magic Accuracy Initiative Range Price Description

A double-edged one-handed sword with a straight blade.

Largely warped, suitable for cutting.

A fine sword for piercing. Many of them have elaborate patterns.

A straight sword with a wide blade.

Premium sword sword made of fine material. Although it is lightweight, its power exceeds that of conventional products.

One handed sword for cavalry. It is suitable for not only slashing but also piercing.

The thick-faced long-sword used by ancient Roman infantry. It is characterized by solid construction and ruggedness.

A wide straight sword featuring an S-shaped or 8-shaped collar and a patterned head of fish tailored shape.
